item.description:
We have decided to cary on with our near future plan and discuss Hume's essay during two meetings. Let's have the first 7 chapters of this enquiry for this meeting, and the rest for the next.

Here is a suggestion of one of our members about buying the book:
Barnes and Noble has their own Hume's Enquiry Concerning Human Understanding for $8, the Oxford edition is $25. all the B&N stores have it, and here's the link to it online:
http://search.barnesa...
item.how_to_find_us: Please ask for the philosophy meetup group...
item.name: Hume: An Enquiry Concerning Human Understanding
